price: E, se te fazemos ir, por certo, vingar-nos-emos deles;
arabic: فَإِمَّا نَذۡهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنۡهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fa-immā nadhhabanna bika fa-innā min'hum muntaqimūna
